name: WindowCleanerRadio
0:
”Alexa, open Window Cleaner Radio”
”Alexa, ask Window Cleaner Radio for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Window Cleaner Radio”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: window cleaner radio
des:
This is the Cleaning Industry podcast, window cleaning, pressure washing, maid service, and carpet cleaning. This podcast is for anyone with a cleaning company who wants to learn about the business side of what they are building. If you own a window cleaning or pressure washing company, WCR Nation is a great listen. Learn how to start a window cleaning business, how to run one and other tips and tricks. Listen to the latest podcasts from WCR Nation. 

You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
